<% entries.each { entry-> %>

<% entry.tags.each { tag-> %> <category term="<%= tag %>" /> <% } %>
<%= entry.summary %> <content type="html" src="http://www.coffeaelectronica.com/<%= entry.path %>" />
<% } %>
